data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3474879,"name":"Scott Bartz","username":"liteduty6758","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/l/e495f1/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-08T02:27:34.225Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eOur team is still, frustratingly, stuck with our swerve bot.  We bought the Mk4i swerve last year, made a couple posts about it, and eventually had to put off the coding due to season restraints.  It is now 2025, and we have spent the last few months working on it, to no success.  We had teams reach out with examples to help us, but then Rev updated this season and changed a lot of our original code to work differently.  Now, we have no ideas on what to call, how to call, or where to call it.  Any and all help would be greatly appreciated as we have worked our butts off trying to code this bot.
